text:
As javascript and CSS can contain some "content" as well it is only logical that
this content is encoded in the same way as the webpage is; and thus, transmitted
as such. After all, if no HTTP header is provided web browsers will choose the
encoding of the page that links the javascript or CSS file.
creator: bug@annevankesteren.nl
